'''1.20.5 Pre-Release 2''' (known as '''1.20.5-pre2''' in the launcher) is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on April 15, 2024.<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-5-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.20.5 Pre-Release 2}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Command format ===
'''[[Item modifier]]'''
* <code>set_fireworks</code>
** Fields <code>explosions</code> and <code>mode</code> have been grouped together as a sub-object.
*** <code>{ "explosions": <list>, "mode": <mode>, <mode-dependent fields>}</code> becomes <code>{"explosions": {"values": <list>, "mode": <mode>, <mode-dependent fields>}}</code>.
*** <code>explosions</code> field is now optional, while <code>value</code> field inside it is now mandatory.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* <code>Snip it!</code> advancement is renamed to <code>Shear Brilliance</code>.

=== General ===
'''[[Background]]'''
* The animated [[nether portal]] texture is displayed when changing [[dimension]] to or from [[The Nether]].
* The animated [[end portal]] effect is displayed when changing dimension to or from [[The End]].

'''[[Controls]]'''
* Using {{key|Ctrl}} or {{key|Command}} + pick block no longer lists "(+NBT)" in the item tooltip.

'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The data pack version is now <code>40</code>.

'''Protocol'''
* Invalid data in packets sent from a server now cause the game client to disconnect.
